General.Name: Valuer Holding AS
General.Description: Valuer Holding A/S operates a data-driven AI platform for corporations, accelerators, and venture funds in Denmark, Austria, the United Kingdom, the United States, Switzerland, and internationally. Its products include Analyst Research Papers, 3rd Party Integrations, and Radar tracking. The company serves customers in the healthcare and biotech, energy, cybersecurity, sustainability, mobility, industrial engineering, financial services, and other industries. Valuer Holding A/S was founded in 2017 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
